channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 08:40 Air anxiety in the Kiev region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 08:40 Air anxiety in the Kiev region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 08:37 Dumping anxiety in the Donetsk region.Creat by further messages.
